attributes.action: Protect British interests say no to US missile defence on UK soil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Placing US missile defence systems in the UK will offer little or no protection to the UK. They will make it a target for those seeking to strike against America, and will serve as a catalyst for a new missile arms race.

They should be kept off of British soil.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
